seo.title: Techno Fibre | Fiberglass Products
seo.description: A leading manufacturer of high-quality FRP products in Egypt.

HomePage.title: Welcome to Techno Fibre – Fiberglass Solutions

NotFound.title: Page Not Found

slides.title: Techno Fibre | The Leading Manufacturer of All Fiberglass Products in Egypt – Established in 1996
slides.description: We design and manufacture all fiberglass products — handrails, walkways, stadium seats, tanks, and pultruded sections. Superior quality, precision-engineered, and proudly made in Egypt.
slides.imgAlt: Techno Fibre fiberglass manufacturing plant in Egypt — integrated pultrusion line for FRP products

slides.title: Fiberglass Tanks for Water and Chemical Storage
slides.description: 100% rust-proof fiberglass tanks designed to withstand aggressive chemicals and extreme temperatures — the ideal solution for chemical and water treatment industries in Egypt.
slides.imgAlt: FRP storage tanks for chemicals and water — corrosion-resistant — Techno Fibre Egypt

slides.title: Fiberglass Internal Components for Metro and Railway Vehicles
slides.description: Ultra-durable fiberglass components engineered for heavy-duty public transport — fire-resistant and perfectly tailored for metro and railway environments.
slides.imgAlt: FRP internal components for trains — durable — Techno Fibre Egypt

slides.title: Premium Fiberglass Handrails & Stairs — Safety Designed for Life
slides.description: Designed for safety and longevity — our fiberglass handrails and stairs are non-conductive, impact-resistant, and weatherproof — perfect for industrial, marine, and commercial applications.
slides.imgAlt: FRP handrails and stairs — weather and corrosion-resistant — Techno Fibre

slides.title: Fiberglass Guard Shacks & Toilet Cabins — Practical, Fast-Deploy Solutions for Security and Comfort
slides.description: Techno Fibre offers lightweight, modern fiberglass guard shacks and public toilet cabins built to endure Egypt’s harshest environments.
slides.imgAlt: FRP guard shacks — lightweight and corrosion-resistant — Techno Fibre Egypt

about.title: Techno Fibre – Egypt’s Leading Manufacturer of Fiberglass (FRP)
about.intro: Techno Fibre is a market leader in Egypt’s FRP industry, delivering strong, lightweight, and corrosion-resistant solutions.
about.pultrusionText: We are the first company in Egypt with a complete pultrusion line, producing FRP sections as a superior alternative to steel and aluminum.
about.gratingText: We manufacture and supply high-quality FRP gratings — known across Egypt for durability and performance.
about.bmcText: We produce high-performance BMC products using an integrated production line — the ideal alternative to metals and conventional plastics.

clients.title: Our Trusted Partners
clients.description: We take pride in partnering with Egypt’s largest government institutions, industrial leaders, and infrastructure projects.

features.sectionDesc: Techno Fibre delivers end-to-end FRP solutions — from design and manufacturing to installation, distribution, and technical support nationwide.
features.manufacturingText: High-precision manufacturing of FRP products using advanced technologies — delivering unmatched durability, intelligent engineering, and guaranteed performance even under extreme conditions.
features.installationText: On-site installation by trained teams adhering strictly to safety, quality, and timeline standards.
features.supplyText: Dedicated maintenance services and technical support for industrial and government clients across Egypt.

offers.sectionDesc: With decades of experience and a proven track record, we deliver innovative, durable, and sustainable FRP solutions.
offers.experienceDesc: Over three decades of innovation and excellence in FRP manufacturing.
offers.projectsDesc: Successfully delivered across Egypt and the Middle East.
offers.productsDesc: From gratings to tanks, pultrusions, and custom-made solutions.

Contact.title: Contact Us
Contact.subtitle: We’re ready to support your industrial needs. Reach out for inquiries, quotations, or technical assistance.

headOffice.title: Head Office & Manufacturing Plants
headOffice.address: Abd Al-Salam Abu El-Ezz St., Behind Ared Al-Jehini, Qalioubiya - Qalyub, Egypt

Contact.footerMessage: Whether you need technical consultation, a quotation, or on-site support — our team is ready to deliver trusted FRP solutions across Egypt and beyond.

industrial.title: Industrial Products
industrial.desc: Robust FRP solutions for demanding industrial applications

grating.title: [Grating] FRP Walkways | Corrosion-Resistant Industrial Flooring
grating.brief: High-quality FRP gratings from Techno Fibre — Egypt’s top choice for industrial and commercial projects.

grating-1.title: Cast FRP Gratings | Industrial Flooring Resistant to Chemicals
grating-1.brief: High-strength cast FRP gratings for industrial platforms, walkways, and corrosive environments. Ideal for factories, plants, and marine applications.

grating-2.title: Cast FRP Gratings | Anti-Corrosion Flooring for Harsh Environments
grating-2.brief: Superior industrial FRP gratings with enhanced load capacity and acid resistance. Perfect for chemical processing, wastewater plants, and marine platforms.

handrail.title: FRP Handrail & Stair Systems | Safe & Durable Solutions
handrail.brief: Handrails and stairs made from fiberglass by Techno Fibre — manufactured in Egypt.

handrail-1.title: FRP Handrail System | Industrial Walkway Safety
handrail-1.brief: Standard FRP handrails for platforms, walkways, and access stairs. Rust-proof, chemical-resistant, and UV-stabilized.

handrail-2.title: Heavy-Duty Industrial FRP Handrail | Safety Barriers for High-Risk Zones
handrail-2.brief: Reinforced FRP handrails for high-traffic, corrosive areas. Ideal for oil & gas facilities, water treatment plants, and marine installations.

pultrusion.title: FRP Pultruded Sections | Replacement for Steel & Aluminum
pultrusion.brief: Techno Fibre is Egypt’s first company with a full pultrusion line. We produce FRP profiles that replace metal — no rust, zero maintenance.

pultrusion-1.title: I-Shape FRP Pultruded Sections
pultrusion-1.brief: High-strength I-beams for structural frameworks. 70% lighter than steel, completely corrosion-free, lifetime durability.

pultrusion-2.title: FRP Channels & Angles | Pultruded Structural Profiles
pultrusion-2.brief: Multi-purpose FRP channels and angles for supporting structures, cable trays, and platforms. Resistant to acids, salts, and harsh weather.

pultrusion-3.title: Square & Round FRP Pipes | Structural Pultruded Tubes
pultrusion-3.brief: Hollow FRP pipes for railings, fencing, and structural frames. Non-conductive, lightweight, and ideal for electrical and corrosive zones.

urban.title: Smart Urban FRP Products | Infrastructure for Cities & Public Facilities
urban.desc: Lightweight, corrosion-free, maintenance-free FRP products for smart cities — kiosks, manhole covers, junction boxes, and more. Made in Egypt by Techno Fibre.

kiosks.title: FRP Kiosks | Guard Shacks & Toilet Cabins

kiosk-1.title: FRP Information Kiosk | Digital City Solution
kiosk-1.brief: Interactive emergency and digital service kiosk. Weather and vandalism resistant — perfect for parks and public squares.

kiosk-2.title: FRP Advertising Kiosk | Public Toilet Cabins
kiosk-2.brief: Customizable advertising panels for signage or guidance. Rust-proof and low-maintenance for high-density urban areas.

manhole.title: FRP Manhole Covers | Lightweight, Non-Theft, Non-Conductive Drainage
manhole.brief: Non-metallic, non-recyclable, non-conductive covers resistant to corrosion, theft, and heavy loads.

manhole-1.title: Round FRP Manhole Cover | Sewage & Drainage
manhole-1.brief: Lightweight round cover for pedestrian streets and roads. 70% lighter than cast iron, rust-free, easy to install and handle.

manhole-2.title: Square FRP Manhole Cover | Industrial Drainage
manhole-2.brief: Reinforced square cover for factories, airports, and utility sites. Resistant to chemicals and impact.

delivery.title: FRP Delivery Boxes | Secure Parcel Drop Units
delivery.brief: Techno Fibre offers a wide range of delivery box types.

delivery-1.title: FRP Delivery Box | Secure Parcel Locker
delivery-1.brief: Compact secure locker for homes and small buildings. UV and moisture resistant, wall- or pole-mountable.

civil.title: Civil FRP Products | Infrastructure, Storage & Public Safety
civil.desc: High-performance FRP solutions for civil projects: metro interiors, chemical storage tanks, and safe children’s playground equipment — designed in Egypt by Techno Fibre.

metro.title: Metro & Train Interior Components | Seats & Wall Panels
metro.brief: Techno Fibre manufactures lightweight, fire-resistant, and corrosion-proof FRP interior components for metro cars — ideal for high-capacity transit systems.

metro-1.title: FRP Passenger Seats | Comfortable & Easy-to-Clean
metro-1.brief: Cast FRP seats with ergonomic design, anti-slip surface, and chemical resistance. Easy to sanitize, vandal-proof, and compliant with international rail safety standards.

metro-2.title: FRP Wall & Ceiling Liners | Lightweight Interior Cladding for Metro Cars
metro-2.brief: Custom FRP wall and ceiling panels for train interiors. Non-conductive, moisture-resistant, and designed for quick installation — reduces overall train weight and maintenance costs.

tanks.title: Tanks (Drinking Water, Firefighting & Chemical)
tanks.brief: FRP tanks ranging from 0.5 m³ to 1000 m³, designed for storing acids, wastewater, fuel, and chemicals — ideal for all industrial applications.

tank-1.title: Sectional Panel Tank | For Acid & Water Treatment
tank-1.brief: Vertical cylindrical FRP tank for aggressive chemicals and water treatment plants. Capacities from 5,000 to 50,000 liters. Compliant with FDA and ISO standards.

tank-2.title: Transport Tank FRP | Fuel & Wastewater Storage
tank-2.brief: Horizontal FRP tank for fuel, wastewater, or liquid waste transport. Reinforced for mobility and leak-tested.

playground.title: Children's Playground Equipment Made of FRP | Safe, Durable & Colorful
playground.brief: Non-toxic, weather-resistant FRP playground equipment by Techno Fibre. Rust-free, fade-resistant, and vibrant — perfect for schools, parks, and sports clubs — with zero maintenance and long-term durability.

playground-1.title: FRP Climbing Structure | Safe Outdoor Play Equipment
playground-1.brief: Colorful climbing structure with soft edges and UV-stabilized finish. Ideal for kindergartens and public parks. Easy to clean and sanitize.

playground-2.title: Integrated Slide & Swing Unit | Complete Play System
playground-2.brief: Complete play unit from Techno Fibre combining slide and swing. Built with FRP to resist heat, rain, and vandalism — low maintenance and long-lasting.

playground-3.title: Sensory Play Panel FRP | Interactive Educational Station
playground-3.brief: Interactive sensory panels for cognitive development. Perfect for inclusive parks. Made from non-toxic, recyclable FRP materials.

main.title: Explore Our Full Range of Industrial Products
main.subtitle: All high-quality fiberglass products

ProductSlugPage.heroSubtitle: Professional fiberglass products designed specifically for government institutions, industrial facilities, and infrastructure projects.

items.desc: High-strength, corrosion-resistant flooring for factories, plants, and walkways.
Ideal for walkways, platforms, warehouses, and utilities. Non-rusting, electrically insulating, weather and chemical resistant.

grating-2.title: FRP Chequer  Plates | Anti-Slip, Heavy-Duty Flooring for Harsh Environments

items.desc: Engineered for chemical plants, marine piers, and oil & gas facilities. Non-conductive, 100% replacement for metal grates.
Non-conductive, rust-free safety barriers for stairs, platforms, and hazardous zones.
Pre-fabricated for fast installation in factories, water stations, and tank farms.

handrail-2.title: Techno Fibre Handrails & Railings | Various Profiles & Systems

items.desc: Reinforced for oil & gas, wastewater, and marine facilities.
Egypt’s first full pultrusion line. Custom shapes to replace steel and aluminum.

pultrusion-1.title: FRP Pultruded Sections | Replacement for Iron & Aluminum

items.desc: FRP pultruded sections — lighter than iron, rust-free for life. The ideal solution for industrial and marine environments.

pultrusion-2.title: FRP Angles | Corrosion-Resistant Structural Supports for Industrial & Civil Projects

items.desc: FRP angles — a smart alternative to metal in projects requiring long-term durability and reliable performance under harsh conditions.
Used for railings, fencing, and electrical zones. Non-conductive and maintenance-free.
Weather-resistant and customizable.
Weather-resistant and lightweight.
Customizable panels for advertising or directional signs. Ideal for commercial centers, streets, and airports.

manhole.title: FRP Manhole Covers | Lightweight, Anti-Theft Drainage

items.desc: Lightweight, theft-resistant, and corrosion-free. Ideal for smart cities and municipal projects.
FRP manhole cover — lightweight, non-conductive, and corrosion-resistant. Suitable for sidewalks, roads, and pedestrian zones with high load-bearing capacity.
FRP grate designed for industrial areas, airports, and stormwater networks. Withstands heavy loads, impacts, and chemicals — ensures efficient water drainage.
Secure delivery boxes for parcels.
Impact-resistant. The ultimate solution for secure delivery.

metro.title: Metro Train Interior Components | Techno Fibre

items.desc: Integrated FRP interior components for metro cars by Techno Fibre — including seats and flooring. Fire-resistant, lightweight, and easy to clean and maintain.

metro-1.title: Metro Train Interior Components | Techno Fibre

items.desc: Passenger seats by Techno Fibre — ergonomic design, anti-slip surface, and chemical resistance. Perfect for metro and electric train systems.

Custom FRP tanks by Techno Fibre for storing chemicals, fuel, and wastewater — designed for industrial and commercial applications. Leak-proof, corrosion-resistant, and maintenance-free. The ideal solution for facilities requiring long-term durability and safety.
A vertical fiberglass tank — ideal for water treatment plants and chemical industries. Available in capacities from 5,000 to 50,000 liters with easy cleaning features.
A square/rectangular fiberglass tank — maximizes space utilization for storage or transport. Suitable for fuel, water, or wastewater.
A spherical fiberglass tank — distinguished by high resistance to pressure and impact. Subjected to rigorous quality testing and ideal for industrial storage.
A horizontal cylindrical fiberglass tank — perfect for underground or above-ground storage. Leak-proof, lightweight, and easy to install.
Fiberglass cooling towers — used in factories, hospitals, and water/wastewater treatment systems. Known for durability and exceptional corrosion resistance.

playground.title: Children's Playground Equipment Made of Fiberglass | Techno Fibre

items.desc: Outdoor playground equipment made of fiberglass (FRP) — manufactured by Techno Fibre to be safe, non-toxic, and weather-resistant. No rust, no fading, vibrant colors to attract children. Ideal for public parks, schools, and residential complexes — with zero maintenance and guaranteed durability.

playground-1.title: FRP Climbing Structures | Safe Children's Play Equipment

items.desc: Climbing structure made by Techno Fibre from fiberglass. Ideal for kindergartens and public parks.

playground-2.title: Integrated Slide & Swing Unit | Complete Play System

items.desc: Complete play unit by Techno Fibre — combining slide and swing in one robust design. Made of fiberglass to resist rust and moisture.

trustSection.title: Trusted by Government Institutions
trustSection.description: Our products meet the highest standards for government and industrial applications, ensuring reliability, durability, and compliance with international quality standards.

compliance.desc: Our products are manufactured according to international standards...
